ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🌿 I like to eat plants
🐌 I am a land creature that is similar but live in the sea.

ocean.question: I'm a big animal that lives in the sea. I can be blue or grey and I make a loud sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎶 I sing songs in the ocean.
💦 I have a blowhole.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color.
🎨 I use ink to hide.
🖐️ I have many arms to grab things.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in a coral reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often small and bright.
🏠 I live in a colorful home.
🏘️ My home is made of coral.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I pinch with my claws.
🚶 I don't walk forward.
🐚 I can hide in the sand.

ocean.question: I am very long and thin like a snake, and I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I can hide in small spaces.
⚡ I can give you a shock.
🐍 I look like a snake but I'm a fish.

ocean.question: I'm a fish with very sharp teeth. Some say I'm very scary. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have lots of teeth.
🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 People are scared of me when swimming in the ocean.

ocean.question: I float in the ocean and can sting you if you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ I have long tentacles.
🌊 I wobble in the water.
👻 I am clear and see-through.

ocean.question: I am a very tiny sea creature and food for many animals in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🔎 You need a microscope to see me.
🌱 I am like grass of the sea.
🐋 Whales like to eat me.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with a sword on my nose. What am I?

hints.text: ⚔️ I fight with my nose.
💨 I'm a fast swimmer.
🐟 I am a type of marlin.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am very hot!
🔥 I am a star.
🌎 We revolve around me.

cosmos.question: I am round and go around the Sun. I am where you live. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants grow here.
🏘️ You live here with your family.

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I don't have my own light. I reflect the Sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change shape.
🐺 Werewolves love me!
🧀 People think I am made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌌 Some look like animals.
🐻 The Big Dipper is one example.
✨Ancient people told stories about me.

cosmos.question: I am a very hot ball of gas that shines brightly in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am very far away.
🔥 I make my own light and heat.
✨ The Sun is an example of me.

cosmos.question: I am a planet that is red and known for having rusty dust. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me.
🍫 Color of chocolate.
🔥 Named after the god of war.

cosmos.question: I'm the biggest planet in our solar system, with a giant red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ My spot is a huge storm.
💫 I am a gas giant.
🪐 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a giant group of stars, dust, and gas, held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I can be spiral, elliptical or irregular.
✨ Our solar system is part of one of these.
🌌 I am larger than a solar system, but smaller than a universe.

cosmos.question: I am a dirty snowball made of ice, dust and gas, that orbits the sun. I sometimes have a tail.

hints.text: ☄️ I can be seen from earth.
❄️ When I get close to the sun, I start to melt.
✨ My tail always points away from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am created by a collapsing star.
⚫ I am invisible.
🌌 I can swallow up anything that gets too close.
